ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_isfld | |- ( R e. Field <-> ( R e. DivRing /\ R e. CRing ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_simprbi | |- ( R e. Field -> R e. CRing ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_simplbi | |- ( R e. Field -> R e. DivRing ) |
| 4 |  | #P_drngdomn | |- ( R e. DivRing -> R e. Domn ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. Field -> R e. Domn ) |
| 6 |  | #P_isidom | |- ( R e. IDomn <-> ( R e. CRing /\ R e. Domn ) ) |
| 7 | 2, 5, 6 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( R e. Field -> R e. IDomn ) |
